loginSupportPage.forMoreAssistance: For more assistance, visit our [Login Issues Help page](support/login).
loginSupportPage.pageTitle: Having trouble logging in to Business.NJ.gov?

steps.content:
You need a myNewJersey account to log in to [account.Business.NJ.gov](/). myNewJersey is a platform used by different government agencies in New Jersey.

To link your myNewJersey account to account.business.nj.gov:

1. Make sure you're logged out of all other MyNJ accounts across your browser.
2. Open an incognito browser.
3. Go to [https://account.business.nj.gov/](/) and click on the "Get Started" button:
steps.imageAlt: Screenshot showing the Get Started button on the Business.NJ.gov homepage

steps.content:
4. Answer the "Tell us about your business" question and click "Next."
5. Once you're on the dashboard, click on the link in the purple card on the right side of your screen.
steps.imageAlt: Screenshot showing the purple card with the link to create and link myNewJersey account on the dashboard

steps.content: Fill out the email information on the next screen, then click "Create and Link myNewJersey Account." Clicking this link will take you to our partner site, https://my.nj.gov.
steps.imageAlt: Screenshot showing the Create and Link myNewJersey Account form with email fields

steps.content: 7. Follow the prompts to link your existing myNewJersey account. If you have not created an account through myNewJersey yet, create one now.
steps.imageAlt: Screenshot of the myNewJersey login page with options to create an account or link an existing one

loginSupportPage.logoutIfStillHavingTrouble: If you're still having trouble, ~~logoutButton~~ to reset your session on [account.business.nj.gov](https://account.business.nj.gov), and repeat the steps above.

supportCallout.header: Dedicated Business Experts ready to help
supportCallout.body: Still having issues? Chat with a business advocate based in New Jersey.
